attributes.action: Respect the choice made by the people of Britain to leave the EU.
attributes.additional_details:
We feel that a second referendum would be unjust.

If a second referendum was to occur, and the vote was in favour of remain at 51.9%, this presents the same issue currently argued by remain voters. It would be unfair and unjust to do this.

The decision has been made by the people of Britain.
attributes.background: We the signed oppose a decision to hold a second EU referendum and call upon HM Government to respect the vote of the people of Britain to leave the European Union.
